Name: Rum and Cola Float
Description: It's like a Rum and Cola, but with ice cream on top.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Es como ron y cola, pero con helado encima.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 럼 앤 콕 같지만, 위에 아이스크림이 얹혀져 있어요.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Es ist wie mit Rum und Cola, aber mit Eis oben drauf.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: un rhum and coke, mais avec de la crème glacée.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: É como rum e cola, mas com gelo em cima.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Это как ром с колой, но с мороженым сверху.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Rom ve kola gibi ama üstünde dondurma var.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 泡沫朗姆可乐。它很像朗姆可乐，但顶部有雪糕。
